SEARCH

Class BoxBuilder

java.lang.Object
BoxBuilder
public class BoxBuilder extends Object
A class to allow building a JPanel with BoxLayout using the Builder Pattern
See Also:
  • Builder Pattern

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BoxBuilder()
    Constructs a new BoxBuilder, with a JPanel with BoxLayout with PAGE_AXIS by default
    BoxBuilder(String id)
    Construct a new BoxBuilder, with a JPanel with BoxLayout with PAGE_AXIS by default, and register it in the global Components registry

    • add

      public BoxBuilder add(String id, Component component)
      Registers a Component and adds it, wrapped in a JPanel, into this Box
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Component, for registration purposes
      component - The Component to be added

    • preferredSize

      public BoxBuilder preferredSize(int width, int height)
      Sets the preferred size of the JPanel. This should be used instead of setSize() as that method does not work on JPanels with a LayoutManager, like BoxLayout here
      Parameters:
      width - Preferred width
      height - Preferred height
      Returns:
      This BoxBuilder instance

    • build

      public JPanel build()
      Returns the JPanel with BoxLayout with all the specified properties
      Returns:
